author: jesse
title: Awaiting Live Stream from RAI Uno

author: jesse
post: I think we all owe Dave Rolfe a big thank you for resurrecting BSTS. I am a bit confused, however. BSTS seems to have two home pages, one at Dave’s blog and another one at shroud.com. If I visit the BSTS home page at http://shroud.com/bstsmain.htm I see that the President and Patron is the Baroness Ryder of Warsaw and the Chairman is Rodney Hoare, Isn’t that a bit out of date?.
title: Davor Aslanovski to attend B.S.T.S. (British Society for the Turin Shroud) Meeting
